member.name: T:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController
member.summary: Represents a controller for managing comments in the API.

member.name: M:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController.#ctor(SocialConnectAPI.Services.Comments.CommentService,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.LinkGenerator)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The link generator for creating URIs.

member.name: M:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController.GetCommentById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a comment by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the comment to retrieve.

member.name: M:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController.GetCommentsByUserId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves comments associated with a user by their user ID.
member.param: The ID of the user whose comments to retrieve.
member.returns: The list of comments associated with the user.

member.name: M:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController.CreateComment(SocialConnectAPI.DTOs.Comments.Post.Request.PostCommentRequest)
member.summary: Creates a new comment.

member.name: M:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController.UpdateComment(SocialConnectAPI.DTOs.Comments.Put.Request.PutCommentRequest)
member.summary: Updates an existing comment.

member.name: M:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController.DeleteComment(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a comment by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the comment to delete.
member.returns: The result of the delete operation.

member.name: M:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController.LikeComment(System.Int32)
member.summary: Likes a comment by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the comment to like.

member.name: M:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController.DislikeComment(System.Int32)
member.summary: Dislikes a comment by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the comment to dislike.

member.summary: Retrieves the allowed HTTP methods for the current endpoint.
